description: Découvrez les meilleurs hôtels à Hai Phong, Vietnam. Trouvez des offres exclusives et des hébergements de luxe.

hotels.title: Stylish Five-Star Hai Phong City Break with Rooftop Infinity Pool & Luxe Spa
hotels.description: Feel the pulse of Vietnam with an elegant stay at this Mercure urban haven, strategically located in the heart of Hai Phong. From French colonial-era establishments to neo-classical architecture, this five-star hotel acts serves the perfect base to discover the city's timeless charms. Soak up the captivating city views while you take a dip in the sparkling rooftop infinity pool, work up a sweat at the fitness centre, and pamper yourself with invigorating massages at Bloom Spa, perched on the 28th floor. When hunger strikes, savour Vietnamese specialities and delicious steaks at Flame Grill & Bar.
